Wild 7 or Wild 7:Biker Knights is vintage anime based on a manga...it
caught my sight because they use a wolf's head on a red background on
their motorcycles...it is about a bunch of outlaws who become
policement to fight crime etc...what is funnier is it takes place in a
fantasy world complete with a shogun and there are politics involved
as mentioned in one of the links below...looks nice and campy LOL

http://www.animecastle.com/ACUV-1048.html
http://store.yahoo.com/animenation/1588991512.html

IF anyone can rent it and view please give us the low down (super
cheap used copies available)...it is not available on dvd or vcd (I
don't own a VHS player)
